Greyhawk.climate_description: Crossroads metropolis with inland continental climate. Cold winters, hot humid summers, and transitional storms.
Greyhawk.weather_profile: Unpredictable winds, river fog, icy winters, muggy summers.

Verbobonc.climate_description: Temperate lowland city along the Velverdyva River. Fertile lands and long growing seasons support gnome agriculture and regional trade.
Verbobonc.weather_profile: Fog-laced mornings, mild winters, stormy summers, temperate breezes.

Hommlet.climate_description: Edge-of-forest village with mild summers, stormy springs, and autumn fogs. Nestled near Gnarley Forest with significant rainfall.
Hommlet.weather_profile: Bordering forest twilight. Dewy mornings. Thunderstorms frequent in late spring.

Nulb.climate_description: Swampy riverside village plagued by summer humidity and mist. Strategic location on the Imredys Run fosters stormy weather and runoff.
Nulb.weather_profile: Swamp fog. Stagnant humidity. Afternoon lightning.

Rel Mord.climate_description: Located in a humid belt with rich soil and consistent rainfall. The climate supports lush vegetation and frequent thunderstorms.
Rel Mord.weather_profile: Steady rains. Lush vegetation. Tropical air with evening showers.

Dyvers.climate_description: Situated at a trade crossroads, Dyvers endures hot summers and dry winters. Maritime influence tempers heat but adds humidity.
Dyvers.weather_profile: Sultry summers. Coastal winds. Intermittent monsoon rains.

Chendl.climate_description: Royal capital with lake winds and snow-fed forest edges.
Chendl.weather_profile: Cold drizzle, evergreen air, snow squalls.

Sobanwych.climate_description: Forest-reclaimed elven-human village. Mild and magical, deep within Gnarley.
Sobanwych.weather_profile: Canopy-filtered rain, soft breezes, sylvan mist.

Ostverk.climate_description: Military border post with cool breezes and forest spillover.
Ostverk.weather_profile: Wind off the high road, morning fog, spring storms.

Greenway Valley.climate_description: Sheltered gnome heartland. Fertile, brisk, with productive summers and colorful autumns.
Greenway Valley.weather_profile: Morning mist, orchard breezes, valley rain.

Elredd.weather_profile: Hot inland humidity, intermittent sea winds, summer downpours.

Narwell.weather_profile: Rolling hills fog, spring bloom rains, summer heat shimmer.

Safeton.climate_description: Coastal river trade town. Mild winters, wet summers, maritime storms frequent.
Safeton.weather_profile: Salt breezes, storm surges, humid squalls.

Hardby.climate_description: Dry bluff city with inland exposure. Hot summers, dry winters, sand-laced winds.

Rel Deven.weather_profile: Rainfall year-round, tropical gusts, lush canopy storms.

Willip.climate_description: Borderland hill city. Cold winters, mild rains, fortified orchards.
Willip.weather_profile: Snowmelt runoff, spring breezes, hillside fog.

Leukish.weather_profile: Jungle heat, afternoon mists, nightly warm showers.

Trigol.weather_profile: Dense rainforest storms, vibrant canopy humidity, booming thunder.

Niole Dra.weather_profile: Misty green haze, warm rainfall, overgrown quiet heat.

Gradsul.weather_profile: Heavy downpours, muggy air, thunderous twilight clouds.

Westkeep.weather_profile: Tropical tempests, coastal thunder rolls, humid gusts inland.

Kron Hills.weather_profile: Brisk hilltop breezes, cool rain over meadows, scattered mists.

Gnarley Forest.climate_description: Perpetual forest twilight. Towering oaks, damp moss, sudden sunbreaks.
Gnarley Forest.weather_profile: Forest mist, shaded glades, afternoon downpours.

Welkwood.climate_description: Faerie-infused, verdant forest with brighter glades than Gnarley.

Bright Desert.climate_description: Stark wasteland of scorched dunes and ruin-choked cliffs.
Bright Desert.weather_profile: Blistering sun, whirling sand, dry thunder.

Cairn Hills.climate_description: Wind-blasted hills riddled with stone barrows.
Cairn Hills.weather_profile: Chill gusts, spring squalls, rock-shadowed haze.

Wild Coast.climate_description: Maritime strip with unpredictable rains, piratical winds, and sunlit calm.
Wild Coast.weather_profile: Salt wind, monsoon squalls, cloudless heat.
